title: Local Politicians Are Sharing Conspiracy Theories About The Coronavirus
description: A Conservative candidate shared a 5G petition, and Labour and Lib Dem councillors have suggested Boris Johnson faked his illness. View Entire Post ›
content:
Local politicians from three of the UKs biggest parties have been sharing conspiracy theories about the coronavirus on social media, BuzzFeed News can reveal.
Examples of misinformation shared by local politicians include petitions which link the spread of t… [+1644 chars]
